description:
**Fix Overview**:

To potentially resolve detection issues with headphones on a Dell laptop:

1. Try installing the latest Dell driver for your laptop model. You can find the appropriate driver on the Dell support website at the following link: https://www.dell.com/support/home/en-us/product-support/product/latitude-15-3500-laptop/drivers

2. Follow the installation instructions provided on the website, ensuring all previous audio drivers are uninstalled beforehand for a clean installation.

**Details**:
- Ensure that your laptop model is compatible with the driver you are downloading.
- Backup your current driver settings before making changes to avoid any loss of functionality. (LLM Synthesized)
